short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steve Dodge is a game where you have to dodge falling object comming from the sky, with your minecraft Steve character.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the blocky shoes of Minecraft Steve and test your reflexes with "Steve Dodge," an exciting Chrome extension game. Navigate Steve as he dodges an endless barrage of falling objects from the sky, each more challenging than the last. Use keyboard controls to move Steve left and right, making it easy to jump into the action.

The difficulty ramps up as you progress, with faster and more unpredictable falling objects to keep you on your toes. Compete against yourself and try to achieve your highest score and see how long you can survive. So if you are looking for a fun way to pass the time, "Steve Dodge" offers a thrilling and addictive gaming experience right in your browser.
